divs: sighting detailsat 8:10 pm i was walking to the house from the barn and happened to look across the valley and saw a bright white light flash in the field acrost the valley from my farm , it was a bright white light pure white about the size of a orange at arms reach , at around 7:10 i was driving down the road from my house and i saw 3 three flashes come from the north north east in the sky it appeared to be over the hill from me 1\2 to 3\4 of a mile away form me the same flash and pure white light
